code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchBar=_ref=>{let{onSearch}=_ref;const[inputValue,setInputValue]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(inputValue.trim()){onSearch(inputValue.trim());setInputValue('');}};const handleKeyDown=e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'){handleSubmit(e);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"search-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:inputValue,onChange:e=>setInputValue(e.target.value),onKeyDown:handleKeyDown,placeholder:"Enter city name...",className:"search-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,className:"search-button",children:"\uD83D\uDD0D Search"})]})});};export default SearchBar;
